Job Purpose:
Serve as one of the top-performing and most proficient engineers in designing, developing, and testing high-quality software that meets specified functional and non-functional goals.
Qualifications / Education: 
Job Purpose: -
You will be responsible for leading the day-to-day design and implementation tasks for the product. As a specialist engineer, you will be reporting to Technical Manager and accountable to the product Software Architect for the technical implementation while ensuring that it meets the design specifications for functionality and quality.
You will work closely with the Software Architect to define the design specifications and guidelines and serve as a technical lead and mentor for the junior engineers on the team.
Drive & Enable Data ingestion into Datalake & lead Governance of data.
It is expected that you will be producing high-quality, well-tested code 85% of the time with the remaining time spent in design discussions, mentoring sessions, and technology reviews.
Contributing to the overall design specification and standards that will enable the team to produce highly functional and sustainable products that amaze its customers
Leading by example in producing copious amounts of well-constructed and well-tested code that is checked-in and merged daily.
Responsible for ensuring code productivity and quality by managing pull requests and proper engineering practices for Continuous Integration and Deliverability.
Actively participate in meetings related to Agile development methodology such as planning, reviews, retrospectives, and daily status reporting; influence and encourage best practices and mutual accountability.
Mentor and develop engineers in all levels, involved in hiring great engineers.
Must have skills: -
8+ year of experience and advanced mastery of the Java language and its ecosystem of tools and frameworks; proficient with Java algorithms, data structures and design patterns.
Excellent hands-on experience with Spring, Springboot & Hibernate.
Strong experience with relational databases and SQL.
At least 2+ year of experience with Apache Spark & Scala.
Experience of big-data technologies like Snowflake, EMR, Redshift etc.
Understand and enforce the Data Governance standards in all data production
Work closely with Suite Data Governance to align and review data production in an ongoing fashion
Ongoing tuning and optimization
Monitor the performance of the data ingestion and data access to ensure that the tables and queries are optimize. Build the necessary plan to improve the queries and tables based on findings.
Experience developing and supporting multi-tiered, service-oriented applications in a production environment.
Experience working in a Continuous Integration and Delivery environment using tools such as Jenkins.
 
Good to have skills: -
Familiarity and/or experience with public cloud infrastructure and technologies such as Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Experience developing and supporting hosted and/or multi-tenant software services (Software-as-a-Service).
Experience in Front-end frameworks and technologies like Angular JS or Angular 8 and above.
Experience working in a modified Agile methodology development environment and using work item management tools like JIRA.
Proven ability to educate and mentor junior engineers on coding best practices and patterns.
